azurerm_storage_management_policy.description: Manages an Azure Storage Account Management Policy.

storage_account_id.description: Specifies the id of the storage account to apply the management policy to.

name.description: A rule name can contain any combination of alpha numeric characters. Rule name is case-sensitive. It must be unique within a policy.

enabled.description: Boolean to specify whether the rule is enabled.

id.description: The ID of the Storage Account Management Policy.

create.description: Used when creating the Storage Account Management Policy.

update.description: Used when updating the Storage Account Management Policy.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Storage Account Management Policy.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Storage Account Management Policy.
